title: My Obsessive Boyfriend Spoils Me Begrudgingly Both In Bed And At Work
alternative_title: Shuuchaku Kareshi ni Shanai Demo Bed de mo Guzuguzu ni Amayakasarete Imasu ; Shuuchaku Kareshi ni Shanai Demo Bed de mo Guzuguzu ni Amayakasarete Imasu. ; Shuuchaku Kareshi ni Shanai Demo Bed de mo Guzuguzu ni Amayakasareteimasu. ; 집착 남친 때문에 달콤하게 녹아내리고 있습니다 ; 執着カレシに社内でもベッドでもグズグズに甘やかされています。
status: Shuuchaku Kareshi ni Shanai Demo Bed de mo Guzuguzu ni Amayakasarete Imasu ; Shuuchaku Kareshi ni Shanai Demo Bed de mo Guzuguzu ni Amayakasarete Imasu. ; Shuuchaku Kareshi ni Shanai Demo Bed de mo Guzuguzu ni Amayakasareteimasu. ; 집착 남친 때문에 달콤하게 녹아내리고 있습니다 ; 執着カレシに社内でもベッドでもグズグズに甘やかされています。
description:
Description :
        "I was the one who couldn't forget." His voice is the same as back then, his gentle hands are driving me crazy... I decided I wouldn't see him again, but my body still remembers him... After graduating college, Rinko was unable to date anyone. She moved and changed jobs in hopes of a fresh start in life! Or so she thought. Her ex-boyfriend Haruomi, the reason for her unsuccesful love life, is not only there, but her boss...! "You still love me, right?" Targetting my weak spots with his hot tongue and long fingers, I couldn't resist...! She doesn't want to get back together, yet she just can't escape from this man in her sleep, nor in her wake...!?
